page.title: 13Our School 2
page.content: Our school day is from 8.55 to 3.00pm. We come to school five days a week, doing such things as reading, writing, mathematics, art and craft, music, p.e and topic work. Some mums come in to help us. There are various clubs after school, that we can take part in. These include cricket, football, gymnastics, rounders, netball, chess and craft work. We spend the whole day at school. We have our lunch at school, either a packed lunch or a hot dinner. We have 2 cooks and 2 helpers in the kitchen. 100 dinners are cooked each day. Dinners are also cooked for the old people. We have 5 dinner ladies who look after us at lunchtime. Groundsmen come in every Thursday. They cut the grass, mark out the track and carry out general gardening duties. They use a tractor mower to cut the field .
